kata_model Namespace Reference

Detailed Description

include all neccessary classes and the given model

Parameters:
string model name without .php - if null it just loads all needed classes

The cluster Model - supports replication and failover, like hyperdb

Kata - Lightweight MVC Framework <http://www.codeninja.de/> Copyright 2007-2009 mnt@codeninja.de, gameforge ag

Licensed under The GPL License Redistributions of files must retain the above copyright notice.

The cluster enabled model-class give it an array of connection-names for database-masters (those are used to alter data) and an array of connection names for slaves (those are used to read data) and it automatically cycles between them if one fails. master and slave may overlap, the same connection is used then.

Author:
mnt@codeninja.de
